snippet: Spain’s 17 regional governments agreed to stick to budget deficit targets set by the central government, giving Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy some breathing space.
abstract: Spain’s 17 regional governments agree to commit to budget deficit targets set by the central government, giving Prime Min Mariano Rajoy some leeway as he faces pressure from investors and his European counterparts to clean up the nation's banks and public finances.
lead_paragraph: Spain’s 17 regional governments agreed to stick to budget deficit targets set by the central government, giving Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy some breathing space.

headline.seo: Spanish Regions Agree to Central Government Deficit Plan
headline.main: Spanish Regions Agree to National Deficit Plan
headline.print_headline: Spanish Regions Agree To National Deficit Plan
